statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, address FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT id, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Ave';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE id = 2
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%'
SELECT address, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY last_name, first_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 3;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 1000.00;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT order_date, total_amount, customer_name FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id ORDER BY order_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, order_date, product_name FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON products.product_id = orders.order_id WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT customers.full_name, orders.order_date, products.product_name FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id INNER JOIN order_details ON orders.order_id = order_details.order_id INNER JOIN products ON order_details.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;

SELECT c.full_name, o.order_date, p.product_name, od.quantity FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders;
SELECT product_name, price, description FROM products;
SELECT category_name, description FROM categories;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT category_name, description FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 500;
